data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Eating a balanced diet can affect one's life in many diverse ways. Eating ____ of ____ and ____ can ____ up ____ skin. In ____, ____ the ____ vitamins ____ even ____ you ____! Healthy eating habits are vital.
data.partBlankContent: Eating a balanced diet can affect one's life in many diverse ways. Eating lo__ of fr___ and veget_____ can cl___ up yo__ skin. In fa__, get____ the ri___ vitamins c__ even ch___ you u_! Healthy eating habits are vital.
data.fullContent: Eating a balanced diet can affect one's life in many diverse ways. Eating lots of fruit and vegetables can clean up your skin. In fact, getting the right vitamins can even cheer you up! Healthy eating habits are vital.
data.answer: 饮食均衡可以在许多方面影响一个人的生活。多吃水果和蔬菜可以清洁皮肤。事实上，摄入正确的维生素甚至可以让你开心起来!健康的饮食习惯至关重要。
